meanings.definition: A stone that forms the base of a corner of a building.
meanings.sent1: The cornerstones of the house were strong and sturdy.
meanings.sent2: The architect carefully placed the cornerstones to ensure the building's stability.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorns under the cornerstones of the house.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the old lighthouse was described as the cornerstones of the coastal town.
meanings.sent5: The ancient ruins revealed the cornerstones of a forgotten civilization.
